list.testimony: The fallen bamboo-blades around it were stained with bloody blossoms. No, the blood was no longer running.

list.testifier: The Testimony of an old Women
list.testimony: He was of a gende disposition, so I am sure he did nothing to provoke the anger of others.

list.testifier: The Testimony of an traveling Buddhist
list.testimony: And I remember that he carried some twenty odd arrows in his- quiver.
You say that this bow and these arrows look like the ones owned by the dead man?

list.testifier: The Testimony of a Masago the wife
list.testimony: A streak of sinking sunlight streamed through the clump of cedars and bamboos, and shone on his pale face.
Someone ... that someone drew the small sword sofdyout of my breast in its invisible hand.

list.testifier: The Testimony of Tajomaru the Bandit
list.testimony: When he came in front of the grove, I told them that the treasures were buried in it, and I asked them to come and see.
